verbs.description: [ARG0: The government] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARG1: that 1,995 children were separated from 1,940 adults at the U.S .- Mexico border between April 19 and May 31 , as the Trump administration implements stricter border enforcement policies] .

The government said on Friday that 1,995 children [V: were] separated from 1,940 adults at the U.S .- Mexico border between April 19 and May 31 , as the Trump administration implements stricter border enforcement policies .
